item.title: My First Blog
item.description: Introduction Hey, Yesterday I have decided to makemyown blog, so after going through various options ranging from CMS such as wordpress, wix to stuff like gatsby I have decided to use hugo.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there, I am Umang Jain. I am not a geek who is interested in anything related to computers or science fiction. After years of slogging and hardwork, I finally managed to gain admission to the Indian Institute of Technology, Varanasi (IIT BHU) and currently pursuing my Integrated Dual Degree (IDD) in the Computer Science and Engineering Department. Iâ€™m currently very excited to join at oracle on 7th May, 2021 as an Application Developor.
